original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2441)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2441)@</color>召喚2隻大地之龍，在目標範圍內敵上下穿梭攻擊，引發地震，同時以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2441)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2441)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2441)@</color> summons 2 earth dragons, and the enemy shuttles up and down within the target area to attack, causing an earthquake. At the same time, they will use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2441)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy.
